original_title: Thomas Hampson: Voices of Our Time
overview: Celebrated American baritone Thomas Hampson lends his extraordinary voice to this Mahler-dominated collection -- alongside pianist Wolfram Rieger -- in this 2001 performance at the Theatre Musical de Paris-Chatelet. Hampson brilliantly works his way through "Ablösung im Sommer," "Das irdische Leben," "Lied des Verflogten im Turm," "Wo die schönen Trompeten blasen," "Des Antonius von Padua Fischpredigt," "Der Tamboursg'sell" and more.
title: Thomas Hampson: Voices of Our Time
